page.title: 04Living in Kirkby and Busby
page.content: The area where I live is between { Kirby}and{Busby.}It is called Dromonby. Dromonby goes back to the medival times and when{William the 1st invaded. There are only four buildings the house, hall, cottage and coach house. The big house was owned by the {Dobsons,}they lived there for years. The old hall dates back to norman times, but now is been made into a luxury house. The house is now very modern and is having tennis courts built in the paddock. In Kirby there is a church and a good post office. Kirby is a very old village and has a Public house. The village now has about thirty modern houses. There are still old houses in Kirby.{The name {Kirby dates back to the vikings.}It is a small country village, surrounding it is the Wainstones, Cold moor and Cringly.
